name: vulners-lookup
description: Chrome extension for CVE detection and vulnerability lookup using Vulners.com

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:css && npm run copy:dist
scripts.copy:dist: sed 's|dist/||g' manifest.json > dist/manifest.json && sed 's|dist/||g' popup.html > dist/popup.html && cp -r assets dist/
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run build:bundle:prod && npm run build:css && npm run package
scripts.package: mkdir -p build && sed 's|dist/||g' manifest.json > build/manifest.json && sed 's|dist/||g' popup.html > build/popup.html && cp dist/*.js dist/*.css build/ && cp -r assets build/
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
